 1999-21631999-12-090,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the CANADA TRAVELLING EXHIBITIONS INDEMNIFICATION REGULATIONS which establish the Canada Travelling Exhibitions Indemnification Program whereby the Government of Canada will assume financial responsibility for the loss or damage to eligible objects and appurtenances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0467 Publication Date: 1999-12-22
